amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in the bill to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act which prohibits Federal agencies from entering into contracts for the procurement of an alternative fuel unless its lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions are less than or equal to emissions from an equivalent conventional fuel produced from conventional petroleum sources.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to enforce section 526 of the Energy Independence Security Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 173 (Roll no. 233).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flores amendment (A045) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 173 (Roll no. 233).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Flores.
